entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.InvalidOperationException: Nullable object must have a value. EF Core and OData 8 #31655
  • Create fluent API for JsonValueReaderWriter on a property #31647
  • WHERE conditions are duplicated when nested query is reused in LINQ #31646
  • the function of Self join / Self referencing urgently needs to be easy to use in 8.0. #31645
  • 💡 Feature Request: Scaffolding models (via "DB First") can generate enums instead of a string/number if we can give the scaffold some hints #31644

Closed

  • Is it possible to create a value generation strategy so it produces a single value for all the entries saved during SaveChanges? #31608
  • Use C# structs or classes as value objects #9906
    8.0.0-rc2
  • VB.NET generated sql WHERE statement issue #31578
  • Support For Ef Core 6 Free Text #31530
  • Unable to execute "dotnet ef migrations add init" #31527
  • WHERE with tuples and IN operator #31492
  • Is there a schema extraction api? #31476
  • A required response; due continuance #31446
  • 'Could not load type 'System.Drawing.BitmapSuffixInSatelliteAssemblyAttribute' from assembly 'System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a'.' #31425
  • How to get Point-Read with EF Core 6.0 & CosmosDB, Find & FindAsync methods #27679
    8.0.0
  • An issue with query filtering and aggregation, after upgrading from 6.0.0 to 6.0.16 #31255
  • Implement complex types (value objects) #13947
    8.0.0-rc1
  • Allow Multi-region or Application Preferred Regions in EF Core Cosmos #29424
    8.0.0
  • Add embedded READMEs to NuGet packages #26556
    8.0.0-rc2
  • Add type mapping APIs to customize JSON value serialization/deserialization #30677
    8.0.0-rc2
  • Primitive collection type mapping infra doesn't support reverse-engineering #31505
  • Filtering on fields that have conversion do not convert correctly when using "IN" operator #31577
  • Trying to instruct EF Core to generate GUIDs on INSERT, but also let me set my own values - fails #31642

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix to #31597 - RC1: UnreachableException when loading with proxies and a JSON-mapped complex property #31656
  • Make RelationalEntityTypeExtensions.GetDefaultTableName return null for owned abstract types in a TPC hierarchy #31653
  • Map complex type properties to nullable columns when the complex type is declared on a derived type in TPH. #31652
  • Call appropriate assign method in JSON shaper #31651

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31650
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Add readme for sql server #30466
    propose-close
  • Cosmos: use Point-Read when the key is a Guid. #31639
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31649
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Cosmos: Add a way to configure Application Preferred Regions #31643
  • Add readme for EFcore.Desgin NuGet package #30471
    propose-close
  • Add readme file for nuget package EFCore.Tools #30470
    propose-close
  • Validate complex properties are not null when saving #31584
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31641
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Updated

  • [bug-fix] Use token for NonQueryResultAsync #31449
